lines.text: It won't be long before I, beautiful goddess that I am, become Queen of Videoland! Ah-ha ha ha ha!
I'm afraid we can't hold out much longer. Kid Icarus, your loyalty has never diminished.
Just doing my duty, your highnikus.
Megaman, you fought bravely, and well.
A pleasure to serve you, your worship.
Simon, you've been our anchor in a long and terrible storm.
How did I get here? Simon Belmont? Kid Icarus? Megaman?
And you must be Captain N. Ha! Ha! Ha!
You guys aren't real. You're just so many computer plates in my game cartridges.
Looks like the ultimate warp zone brought us the ultimate wimp!
I'm in love. Uh, I mean I'm Kevin.
Thanks, Kevinikus. You're a pretty good game master, after all.
Thank me later. We've got to warp out of here before Donkey Kong gives us the Big Game Over.
